participant_1.background:
I'm getting by, but it's hard to concentrate with my two roommates always around.
my favorite movie is gone with the wind.
i make my own soap.
I left college to pursue my passion for brewing beer.
i enjoy movies about aliens invading the earth.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy eating at the local pub on sunny days after a round of golf with my friends.
My favorite thing to do is read, but I would be unable to do it if I were blind.
i manage all the paperwork and incoming calls.
I love to travel and capture moments with my camera.
i m not much of a fan of hot weather.

content.text: I'm doing well, just finished a round of golf with my friends.
That sounds like fun, I enjoy golf but haven't played in awhile.
Yeah it was a beautiful day, perfect weather for it.
I bet! I love to golf on sunny days.
Me too, but not too hot. I can't stand the heat.
Same here, I prefer the cooler weather.
What do you do for fun?
I enjoy reading, watching movies, and brewing beer.
That's awesome, I love reading too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like a lot of different types of books, but I'm really into historical fiction and sci-fi right now.
I love sci-fi too! What are some of your favorite sci-fi movies?
I'm a big fan of the Alien movies, and I also like the Terminator movies.
Those are both great movies! I also love the Star Wars movies.
Me too! I can't wait for the new one to come out.
Yeah, me too! It looks like it's going to be great
